title: The Flame and the Arrow
description:
The Flame and the Arrow , 1950

Synopsis
Lighthearted adventure about an overlord, Count Ulrich - who takes it one step too far. It was bad enough when he kidnapped the pretty wife of the young archer Dardo. But when Ulrich takes the manÃ‚Â´s son - a rebel leader is born..
